name: get-plasmid-sequence
title: Get Plasmid Sequence
description: Retrieve plasmid sequences from Addgene or NCBI databases
content:
Overview

This application retrieves plasmid sequences from either Addgene (using plasmid ID) or NCBI (using plasmid name).

Features

  • Searches Addgene by plasmid ID
  • Searches NCBI by plasmid name
  • Auto-detects source based on identifier
  • Returns complete plasmid sequence

Parameters

  • Identifier: Plasmid ID (numeric for Addgene) or name (for NCBI)
  • Source: Optionally force Addgene or NCBI lookup

Output

Returns a JSON file with the plasmid sequence, source database, and identifier.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni requests beautifulsoup4 && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/get_plasmid_sequence.py "${identifier}" ${source} -o "${outputDir}"
